resources.string: No connection to the server. Check the network connection. Try it in a moment.
Don\'t have an account? Sign up
Your account is still not verified. Click on the link received in the e-mail during registration or send the link again.
Your account has been verified. Thank you.
Password must contain at least 10 characters
By signing up you agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
The passwords must be the same
Enter the email address associated with your account and we will send you a link to reset your password.
The form contains errors. Please enter a valid email and your password.
Something went wrong. Please try later.
A link to reset your password has been sent to your address. Check your e-mail (also Spam) and follow the instructions.
If you have followed the steps received in the e-mail to set a new password, then log in to the application using the new password.
The form contains errors. Please enter a valid email.
There is no user with the given email address and password.
The email address is already in use by another account.
A verification link has been sent to your email address. Follow the instructions.
No connection to the server. Check the network connection. Try it in a moment.
The user account has been disabled by an administrator
The password is incorrect. If you have forgotten your password, click \"Forgot Password?\"
Access to this account has been temporarily disabled due to many failed login attempts. You can immediately restore it by resetting your password or you can try again later.

Please confirm your registration by clicking on the link received in the e-mail. Confirmation of registration is necessary to take full advantage of the functionality of the application. Make sure that the messages do not end up in the spam folder in your inbox.
Your account has been created. Please confirm your registration via the link in the email. Thanks for using the app.
